-e ---

𐀸 ʳweʳ weⁿ weˢ 𓄶 𓏲 wr / wn 󲏖 󲎨 󲎄 󲃓 󲆩 󲃔 󲋓 󲃖 󲊩 󲎋 󲃕 𔗨 ᵛaₓ 𔒻 wi •Wirbel

𐀸 ≠ 𐝂 1/5 𐝃 𐝄 𐝅 Linear-A
𐘽 •WR •RW RA₂ •river 𔗬

𐀸 weʳ Fειʳ "ear" e.g. 𐀉𐀺𐀸 du-wo-we δυFώFεις with two ears/handles
𐀸 we Fεις Fass phoze "ear" ⇔ 𒅖𒈠𒀀 ʰiš 𐌷𐌰𐌿𐍃 hörs hear

𐀸 Fες fais- fact- faire

proven r

𐀸-𐀸-𐀁-𐀀 weʳweʳe-a FερFέεια (*FέρFος> είρος) "woolen" ( r > l)

𐀈-𐀸-𐀍 doʳwe-jo δορFείος made of wood ( δορF tree)
𐀈-𐀸-𐀍 do-weʳjo δορFείος made of wood

𐀶𐀸𐀀 tu-weʳ-a θύFεα •Tauffeuer sacrificial fire

𐀂-𐀋-𐀫 ʰi-je-ro ἱερός hieró- holy, sacred
𐀂-𐀋-𐀸 ʰi-je-weʳ heir "son" ⇔ Erbe Erpel 𓅭 ⇔ 𐀂-𐀍 i-jo

𐀸𐀭 weʳsa Fεσσα √faire make

possible n:
𐀸-𐀵 | we-to | the current year | Wende?

𐀸 Fεν "provided"

possible s:
𐀸-𐀴 | we-ti | vest in 𐀁-𐀠-𐀸-𐀴-𐀪-𐀍 e-pi-weˢti-ri-jo ἐφεστρίς 'upper garment' (could be 𐀴 sti)

-𐀸 suffix ≈ 𓏲 𓅱 in

𐀁-𐀪-𐀝-𐀸 e-ri-nu-we Ἐρινύς 'the Erinys' theonym, dative of e-ri-nu
